page.syntax: Rounded_Number as N = ROUND(N number,N decimal_places)

argument.name: decimal_places
argument.description: A integer number greater than or equal to zero.

page.description: Rounds off a number to a specified number of decimal places.
page.discussion: ROUND() returns a Number rounded off to the specified number of Decimal_Places. If you round to zero Decimal_Places, an integer is returned.
